Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are being developed for integrated gasification power plants that generate electricity from coal at 50+% efficiency.
Titulo: Performance of solid oxide fuel cells operated with coal syngas provided directly from a gasification process

Sentencas: The interaction of trace metals in coal syngas with Ni-based SOFC anodes is being investigated through thermodynamic analyses and in laboratory experiments, but test data from direct coal syngas exposure are sparsely available.
Titulo: Performance of solid oxide fuel cells operated with coal syngas provided directly from a gasification process

Sentencas: This effort evaluates the significance of performance losses associated with exposure to direct coal syngas.
Titulo: Performance of solid oxide fuel cells operated with coal syngas provided directly from a gasification process

Sentencas: Specimen are operated in a unique mobile test skid that is deployed to the research gasifier at NCCC in Wilsonville, AL The test skid interfaces with a gasifier slipstream to deliver hot syngas to a parallel array of twelve SOFCs.
Titulo: Performance of solid oxide fuel cells operated with coal syngas provided directly from a gasification process

Sentencas: During the 500 h test period, all twelve cells are monitored for performance at four current densities.
Titulo: Performance of solid oxide fuel cells operated with coal syngas provided directly from a gasification process

Sentencas: Degradation is attributed to syngas exposure and trace material attack on the anode structure that is accelerated at increasing current densities.
Titulo: Performance of solid oxide fuel cells operated with coal syngas provided directly from a gasification process

Sentencas: Cells that are operated at 0 and 125 mA cm(-2) degrade at 9.1 and 10.7% per 1000 h, respectively, while cells operated at 250 and 375 mA cm(-2) degrade at 18.9 and 16.2% per 1000 h, respectively.
Titulo: Performance of solid oxide fuel cells operated with coal syngas provided directly from a gasification process

Sentencas: Spectroscopic analysis of the anodes showed carbon, sulfur, and phosphorus deposits; no secondary Ni-metal phases were found.
Titulo: Performance of solid oxide fuel cells operated with coal syngas provided directly from a gasification process
Performance of solid oxide fuel cells operated with coal syngas provided directly from a gasification process
